original_text: On their way, they made their camp at Kiriath-Jearim in Judah. That place on the west side of Kiriath-Jearim is still called Mahaneh Dan.
korean_text: 올라가서 유다에 있는 기럇여아림에 진 치니 그러므로 그 곳 이름이 오늘까지 마하네 단이며 그 곳은 기럇여아림 뒤에 있더라

sentences.original_text: they made their camp at Kiriath-Jearim in Judah
That place on the west side of Kiriath-Jearim
